original_title: ナマ配信　暴かれた禁断のプライバシー
overview: Irreparable live delivery ... It was too late when I noticed ... Sanako Nishimura, a college student, learned that her friend Mami was doing a net idol, and Sanako who forced her to participate in Mami's live delivery was also raw. Decide to start distribution. Her live delivery, knowing her pleasure of being seen, gradually becomes more radical and stimulates the distorted sex of men.
title: Live Streaming
